content.html: If you’re not Black, stay out of it. If people use it affectionately within their own community, that’s not a slur the way it is when a non-Black person uses it. Even if you don’t like it, it’s not your job to police how Black people talk to each other.
content.value:
If you’re not Black, stay out of it. If people use it affectionately within their own community, that’s not a slur the way it is when a non-Black person uses it. 

Even if you don’t like it, it’s not your job to police how Black people talk to each other.
